biography.bio: Germaine Roger was born on February 12, 1910 in Marseille, France. She was an actress, known for La mascotte (1935), Un de la Canebière (1937) and Debout là-dedans! (1935). She died on April 20, 1975 in Savigny-sur-Orge, France.
biography.name: Germaine Roger

biography.bio: Lucien Baroux was born on September 21, 1888 in Toulouse, Haute-Garonne, France. He was an actor, known for Derrière la façade (1939), The Devil and the Ten Commandments (1962) and Father's Dilemma (1950). He died on May 21, 1968 in Soorts-Hossegor, Landes, France.
biography.name: Lucien Baroux

biography.bio: Armand Dranem was born on May 23, 1869 in Paris, France as Armand Ménard. He was an actor, known for The Clever Baker (1904), L'assassinat de Mac Kinley (1902) and La poule (1933). He was married to Suzette O'Nil. He died on October 13, 1935 in Paris.
biography.name: Armand Dranem

biography.bio: Thérèse Dorny was born on September 18, 1891 in Paris, France as Thérèse Jeanne Longo-Dorni. She was an actress, known for Diabolique (1955), L'acrobate (1941) and Devil's Daughter (1946). She was married to André Dunoyer de Segonzac. She died on March 14, 1976 in Saint-Tropez, Var, France.
biography.name: Thérèse Dorny

biography.bio: René Lestelly was born on February 19, 1904 in Liège, Belgium as René Edmond Louis Lelais. He was an actor, known for Saturnin de Marseille (1941), La mascotte (1935) and La crise est finie (1934). He died on February 4, 1993 in Meaux, France.
biography.name: René Lestelly

biography.bio: Janine Guise is an actress, known for Nuits de Venise (1931), Slipper Episode (1935) and La mascotte (1935).
biography.name: Janine Guise

biography.bio: Eric Roiné is an actor, known for La mascotte (1935), Court Waltzes (1933) and Adam est... Ève (1954).
biography.name: Eric Roiné

biography.bio: Jean Tissier was born on April 1, 1896 in Paris, France. He was an actor, known for ...And God Created Woman (1956), L'assassin habite... au 21 (1942) and The Hunchback of Notre Dame (1956). He was married to Georgette Tissier. He died on March 31, 1973 in Granville, Manche, France.
biography.name: Jean Tissier

biography.bio: Pierre Labry was born on December 14, 1885 in Paris, France as Pierre Honoré Labry. He was an actor, known for Les Visiteurs du Soir (1942), The Story of a Cheat (1936) and Carnival in Flanders (1935). He died on June 23, 1948 in Paris.
biography.name: Pierre Labry

biography.bio: Georges Bever was born on September 22, 1884 in Paris, France as Georges Van Bever. He was an actor, known for Popaul veut dormir (1931), Tu m'as sauvé la vie (1950) and Hélène (1936). He died on January 14, 1973 in Paris.
biography.name: Georges Bever

biography.bio: Léon Larive was born on June 28, 1886 in Paris, France as Léon François Larive. He was an actor, known for The Passion of Joan of Arc (1928), Zero for Conduct (1933) and The Rules of the Game (1939). He died on July 20, 1961 in Paris.
biography.name: Léon Larive
